name: Nut Nightmare
description:
Oh what a terrible night to gather nuts...

As night approches and the blood moon rises, you have been chosen to gather the precious nuts of the forest. Beware of the horrors that lie within, for they hunger for what you carry.

Your village needs you!

Brave this horrible night and gather nuts for your tribe. Kneel to grab the nuts, once you have enough return to base and you will be tasked to gather more.

Beware of the nightmare squirrels, for they can strip the flesh off a man in an instant.

And don't get greedy.

Controls

A/Left and D/Right for left and right movement

Space to jump 

S/Down to Kneel/Gather Nut

Developer Note

Thank you for playing my first ever released game! This game is a polished up version that I made for Ludum Dare 40 made in the Godot Engine. If you have any comments or concerns I'd love to hear about them in the comments.

Thanks again, I'll see you next game!
